name: Hydro Tulpa
title: "Awakened Egregore" Hydro Tulpa
desc: A human-shaped monster formed from the agglomeration of countless drops of water.

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Hydro Tulpa

skills.name: Storm Surge
skills.desc: Deals ? ?, and randomly triggers the End Phase effect for 1 of your Summons. If this character's HP is not lower than 2, they will receive 1 Piercing DMG.

skills.name: Thundering Tide
skills.desc: Deals ? ?, triggers the End Phase effect for all of your Summons.

skills.name: Branching Flow
skills.desc: When this character's HP is not lower than 3, and all your Summons apart from Half-Tulpa leave play: This character receives 2 Piercing DMG and summons 1 independent Half-Tulpa. (Once per Round)
